titles: The ladies priviledge As it was acted with good allowance at the Cock-pit in Drury-lane, and before their Majesties at White-Hall twice. By their Maiesties Servants. The author Henry Glapthorne.
author: Glapthorne, Henry.
publisher: By I. Okes, for Francis Constable, and are to be sold at his shops in Kings-street, at the signe of the Goat, and in Westminster-hall,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
